subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to give a loan for a low month payment
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$385,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://icvbmitecat.com/
